title: My Mastery 7 just disappeared
body: I was playing singed and I used my mastery emote to bm, but it was mastery 6. I'm so confused, because i used to have mastery 7 singed.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and don't see a sign that you were Mastery 7 with Singed. If you'd like to have us look into this further, I'd recommend submitting a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
